text:
Canonical, London, UK, full time, on-site http://www.canonical.com

Visual Designer

We are looking for a midweight UI/UX designer to work on convergent Ubuntu user interfaces on phones, tablets and desktop.

You should be a good communicator and a team player, have an excellent eye for clean, functional design and experience designing for mobile/responsive web.

Prototyping skills with the technology of your choice would be a bonus, but not required. We use a combination of JS/HTML/QML/After Effects for prototyping.

This is primarily a Visual Design position, with some UX involved.

Contact me at jouni.helminen@canonical.com

No agents please.
